script:
1). It's cold in here today.
I know. I'm boiling.
Yes, it is cold out there.
I wonder if the heat is on. 
2). What did you do with the requisition form?
No, I didn't sign the form.
I left it on Karen's desk. 
Yes, I have seen it.
3). Are you sure Mr. Bradley won't mind us leaving early?
He said we can go when our work is done. 
No, I'm sure that he said we couldn't.
Yes, I'm certain that Mr. Bradley will mind.
